normalised: Brand Collaborations are hot, hot, hot in the influencer space! Forget your regular ads, brands are now pairing up faster than Rahul and Anjali at a college reunion.

unnormalised: Brand Collaborations are HOT, Hot, HOT in the influencer space! Forget your regular ads, brands are now pairing up faster than Rahul and Anjali at a college reunion.
normalised: Think Mamaearth teaming up with Bhuvan Bam for skincare comedy sketches - genius, right? Or Paytm partnering with a local biryani vendor in Hyderabad for Onam offers - talk about craving satisfied!

normalised: These collabs aren't just about slapping a logo on a post. We're seeing real creativity, with brands like Sabyasachi working with Instagram influencers to showcase traditional weaves in a fresh light. It's about authenticity, yaar!

normalised: Even I I T Bombay students are getting in on the action, collaborating with ed-tech platforms for sponsored coding workshops. Imagine getting paid to code in your dorm room!
